articles.author: Angela Ukomadu
articles.title: Nigerian teen in pink aims to 'take the golf world by storm'
articles.description: A steady "thwack" rings out at the driving range just outside Nigeria's capital Abuja. A girl clad in pink shoes, pink skirt and pink vest wields a club with a power that belies her slight frame, grimacing at poor shots and smiling happily at others.
articles.content: ABUJA/LAGOS (Reuters) - A steady “thwack” rings out at the driving range just outside Nigeria’s capital Abuja. A girl clad in pink shoes, pink skirt and pink vest wields a club with a power that belies her slight frame, grimacing at poor shots and smiling hap… [+1783 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Britain's Greggs follows vegan sausage roll success with meatless steak bake
articles.description: Britain's Greggs launched a vegan version of its popular steak bake on Thursday, aiming to capitalize on the success of the meatless sausage roll that has boosted the baker's profits and helped fuel an 80% rise in its share price last year.
articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) - Britain’s Greggs launched a vegan version of its popular steak bake on Thursday, aiming to capitalize on the success of the meatless sausage roll that has boosted the baker’s profits and helped fuel an 80% rise in its share price last year.… [+1292 chars]

articles.title: Brazil's Petrobras says board member Lins tenders resignation -filing
articles.description: Brazil's state-run oil company Petroleo Brasileiro said on Thursday that board member Clarissa Lins had tendered her resignation.
articles.content:
BRASILIA (Reuters) - Brazil’s state-run oil company Petroleo Brasileiro (PETR4.SA) said on Thursday that board member Clarissa Lins had tendered her resignation.

articles.author: Simon Lewis
articles.title: White House hopeful Bernie Sanders raises $34.5 million in fourth quarter
articles.description: Bernie Sanders raised more than $34.5 million in the last quarter of 2019, his presidential campaign said on Thursday, the largest three-month haul of any Democrat so far in the contest to take on Republican President Donald Trump in a November election.

articles.title: Trump re-election campaign raises $46 million in fourth quarter
articles.description: President Donald Trump's re-election campaign raised $46 million in the fourth quarter of 2019, a major haul that was boosted by a surge of donations in the wake of the Democrats' impeachment bid, a senior campaign official said on Thursday.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Donald Trump’s re-election campaign raised $46 million in the fourth quarter of 2019, a major haul that was boosted by a surge of donations in the wake of the Democrats’ impeachment bid, a senior campaign official said on Thur… [+2745 chars]

articles.title: RPT-U.S. shale producers to tap brakes in 2020 after years of rapid growth
articles.description: Vastly slower U.S. oil growth this year and the prospect of a plateau for the world's top oil producer have signaled a new and unfamiliar era of self-restraint for the go-go shale industry.'

By Jennifer Hiller and Liz Hampton

articles.title: Britain's M&G keeps freeze on $3.3 bln property fund
articles.description: British insurer and asset manager M&G will continue the suspension of its 2.5 billion pound ($3.30 billion) property funds, it said on Thursday, after selling 70.4 million pounds of real estate assets to raise cash.
articles.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - British insurer and asset manager M&G (MNG.L) will continue the suspension of its 2.5 billion pound ($3.30 billion) property funds, it said on Thursday, after selling 70.4 million pounds of real estate assets to raise cash.

articles.title: Austrian coalition deal includes headscarf ban, preventive custody: media reports
articles.description: A deal between Austria's conservatives and Greens to form a governing coalition includes banning headscarves in school until the age of 14 and preventive custody for potentially dangerous immigrants, several Austrian media reported on Thursday.
